fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you must choose a role that you played in a previous game and hasn't been removed.
- You will gain the (most recently updated) attributes and abilities of the role you choose, but Attack and Defense will both be increased by a single tier, to a maximum of Overkill/Overprotective.
- Once you choose a role, you will gain a list of people who lost in the game where you played your role. These are your Enemies.
- If you don't have any previous role to choose, this will automatically reroll into a different NC.
- You will not have access to any factional chats your role would normally see, and any ability/attribute you have that refers to a "factional attack" will instead refer to your attacking ability.
- You won't be included in your own list of Enemies and you can't attack yourself unless your chosen role says you can.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Personally kill and/or hang at least 4 of your enemies. If all of your enemies die before this goal is reached, you may then choose any players to kill, as long as your total kill count is at least 4
